name: Desktop Defenders
description:
Desktop Defender

One plays as the cursor. One plays as the antivirus.

Work together in this two player cooperative game to defeat hordes of viruses from destroying your computer! Utilize a vast armory in unique antivirus weapons combined with an arsenal of unique system abilities as the cursor and antivirus to survive the onslaught. 

You must defend your desktop, in desktop defender.
